title: What’s Happening at the Kyle Rittenhouse Trial: The Latest
sub_head: Teen takes the stand in his own defense
body:
Kyle Rittenhouse is on trial for homicide after he shot and killed two men and wounded another during unrest following the police shooting of Jacob Blake in Kenosha, Wis.
He faces multiple criminal counts regarding the incident, including first-degree intentional homicide, first-degree reckless homicide, recklessly endangering safety and possession of a dangerous weapon.
